conclusion: TDGs test shows both MOND and Synchronism predict missing mass

key_findings.LCDM_prediction: No DM in TDGs - contradicted by observations
key_findings.MOND_prediction: Universal V^4 = GMa_0 - consistent with TDG data
key_findings.DF2_challenge: Very low dispersion inconsistent with low C prediction

distinguishing_test: Same M, different rho: Synchronism predicts different V/V_bar

DF2_analysis.challenge: Low sigma inconsistent with expected missing mass
